title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - January 27, 2022
itunes:title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - January 27, 2022
description:
Gary and Mark link up to discuss the recent news that Justice Breyer plans to step down from his Supreme Court seat and who may replace him. They also discuss some news out of Los Angeles that gets Mark fired up.

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
